fullplot: Danny and Bernie are two single men living their lives on the wild side. But when Danny meets Debbie at a bar and the two start a relationship with a one night stand, Danny's life takes a different turn. How does this passionate night become a full affair and what effect will this relationship have on both people and their friendship with their best mates ?
plot: A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.
title: About Last Night...
